content.rendered:
HowToDoInJava.com is a respected blog inside its niche, with close to 2+ million monthly page views. It provides useful best practices, tutorials, articles, code samples, and snippets on the latest technologies such as Core Java, Spring, Struts, JAX-RS, Maven, Jquery, etc.

This blog can help you to reach a loyal audience of influential bloggers, coders, and website owners who visit this blog on regular basis.

1. Audience

  • 2+ Million Page Views/Month
  • 1.5 Millions Unique users/Month
  • 16K+ Facebook Followers
  • 7K+ Twitter Followers
  • 8K+ Email Subscribers

2. Site-wide Advertisement Spaces

The blog has the following existing ad spaces, and all are open for sale. All places can display responsive as well as fixed formats.

  • 4 Ads in the right sidebar – Each Ad slot has fixed charges of $5000/Month or $1500/Week.
  • 1 at the start of the article – It has a fixed charge of $3500/Month or $1000/Week.
  • 1 at the end of the article – It has a fixed charge of $3000/Month or $850/Week.
  • 1 at the start of the comments – It has a fixed charge of $2500/Month or $700/Week.

Pick your desired locations and drop me an email.

Send me a mail at howtodoinjava@gmail.com to discuss further.
